name: Duloxetine

dosing.adult_acute: Depression/Anxiety: 60 mg daily. Pain: 30-60 mg daily
dosing.notes: Take with food. Do not open capsules. Caps: 20, 30, 60 mg.

cautions.renal: Avoid in CrCl <30. Use caution in CrCl 30-80.
cautions.pregnancy: Cat C - Limited data, neonatal effects possible

warnings: Hepatotoxicity - monitor LFTs, avoid in liver disease
